word: PAGE 468. SLIGHTED, SPOKEN AGAINST, RIDICULED, AND REJECTED: REFERENCE IS HERE MADE TO THE ATTITUDE WHICH SOME TOOK IN RESISTANCE TO THE EMPHASIS GIVEN TO THE MESSAGE OF RIGHTEOUSNESS BY FAITH AT AND FOLLOWING THE GENERAL CONFERENCE SESSION OF 1888. SEE HISTORICAL FOREWORD FOR A FULLER STATEMENT INDICATING THAT WHILE SOME TOOK THE ATTITUDE HERE REFERRED TO THERE WERE MANY WHO RECEIVED THE MESSAGE AND GAINED A GREAT BLESSING IN THEIR OWN PERSONAL EXPERIENCE.
